Introducing Deja Vu, the ultimate AI-powered Chrome extension revolutionizing your bookmarking experience directly from any website.

üíé Features:

Effortless Bookmarking
Quickly capture and store bookmarks from any webpage without the need for manual organization.

AI-Powered Search
Simply type in vague details or keywords, and Deja Vu instantly locates your bookmarks for you.

‚å®Ô∏è How to use?
To easily launch Kome, visit any website and follow these simple steps:
1. Open the extension and bookmark pages with tags and descriptions.
2. When you need to retrieve a bookmark, simply scratch any detail of the website.
3. Deja Vu will instantly provide the page you're looking for.

Say goodbye to bookmark struggles and hello to streamlined browsing with Deja Vu!
